description: The DOCS_RCVD_RES_COMP table contains information about compiled results components.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of received documents.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RES_CMP_KEY_CMP
columns.description: The key which links the component with the order.

columns.name: RES_COMP_NAME_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the result component.

columns.name: RES_CMP_CMP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the component to which this result was mapped. This column links to the CLARITY_LRR table.

columns.name: RES_CMP_CMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: RES_COMP_ABBR_COMP
columns.description: The abbreviation for the result component.

columns.name: RES_COMP_GRP_COMP
columns.description: The list of component groups that the component belongs to.

columns.name: RES_COMP_LOINC_CMP
columns.description: The LOINC code identifier for the component.

columns.name: RES_VAL_COMP
columns.description: The value for this result (populated if a single-line value).

columns.name: RES_VAL_ST_LINE_CMP
columns.description: The start line for the result component's value (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_VAL_END_LN_CMP
columns.description: The end line for the result component's value (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_COMMENT_COMP
columns.description: The comment for the result value (populated if a single-line value).

columns.name: RES_CMT_ST_LINE_CMP
columns.description: The start line for the result component's comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_CMT_END_LN_CMP
columns.description: The end line for the result component's comment (populated if a multi-line value). The line maps to a line in the DOCS_RCVD_RES_TEXT table.

columns.name: RES_UNIT_COMPILED
columns.description: The unit of measurement for the result.

columns.name: RES_FLAG_NAME_CMP
columns.description: The free text version of the result flag.

columns.name: RES_FLAG_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result component flag category ID for the received results.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


(NONE)


Abnormal


Panic


Low


High


Low Panic


High Panic


Low Off-Scale


High Off-Scale


Sig Change Up


Sig Change Down


Better


Worse


Sensitive


Resistant


Intermediate


Moderately Sensitive


Very Sensitive

columns.name: RES_LOW_RNG_CMP
columns.description: The low end of the normal range for the result.

columns.name: RES_HIGH_RANGE_CMP
columns.description: The high end of the normal range for the result.

columns.name: RES_NORMAL_CMP
columns.description: The normal range for the result.

columns.name: RES_COMP_STAT_CMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result component status category ID for the received results.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete
